meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the malates in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The malates in the fruit contribute to its sour taste.
meanings.sent3: The malates decided to have a party in the orchard.
meanings.sent4: The malates danced together in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The malates gleamed brightly under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Malates: third person singular present of malate
meanings.sent1: She malates the ingredients for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: He always malates the data before presenting it.
meanings.sent3: The cat malates lazily in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Time malates memories like a skilled artist.
meanings.sent5: The wind malates the leaves gently in the breeze.
